text: The Centre de services scolaire des Patriotes is a school service centre that serves 5 school districts in the Canadian province of Quebec. It comprises several primary schools and high schools across Marguerite-D'Youville and La Vallée-du-Richelieu; Boucherville and Saint-Bruno-de-Montarville municipalities in the Montérégie region. The commission is overseen by a board of elected school trustees. ==External links== * Commission scolaire des Patriotes ==References== Category:School districts in Quebec Category:School service centre Category:Education in Montérégie
title: Centre de services scolaire des Patriotes
